title: Mixweer Chenille Striped Decorative Throw Pillow Covers 20x20 Set of 2 Soft Textured Boho Couch Pillow Case Washable Farmhouse Rustic Cushion Covers for Living Room Couch Sofa Bed(Navy Blue)
description: Features: Beautiful Design without Compromising on Comfort: The pack of 2 pillow covers boasting a two-color design and elegant tassel decoration not only add style but is also soft, skin-friendly, breathable, and durable. Note: pillowcases only, pillow pad or insert not included.  Easy Maintenance for Longevity: To ensure longevity, we recommend hand wash for these farmhouse cushion covers. However, they are also machine washable in a washing bag on a gentle mode and tumble dry on low, for your convenience. Ironing is not recommended.  Specifications: Material: canvas, chenille Color: Navy Blue Size: 20 x 20 inches/ 50.8 x 50.8 cm  Package includes: 2 x Pillow Covers  Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.
